languages.text: {n}Музыка стихает, и Соломон с явным облегчением кладет руку на оружие. Его движениям немедленно возвращается хищная пластичность.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
заканчиваем анимацию танца
РТ и арбитес возвращаются за стол

заканчиваем анимацию танца
РТ и арбитес возвращаются за стол

languages.text: {n}The music fades, and Solomorne lays his hand on his weapon with obvious relief, his movements immediately regaining their predatory fluidity.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Музыка стихает, и Соломон с явным облегчением кладет руку на оружие. Его движениям немедленно возвращается хищная пластичность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The music fades, and Solomorne lays his hand on his weapon with obvious relief, his movements immediately regaining their predatory fluidity.{/n}

{n}The music fades, and Solomorne lays his hand on his weapon with obvious relief, his movements immediately regaining their predatory fluidity.{/n}
{n}The music fades, and Solomorne lays his hand on his weapon with obvious relief, his movements immediately regaining their predatory fluidity.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Musik verklingt und Solomorne legt mit offenkundiger Erleichterung die Hand auf seine Waffe. Seine Bewegungen sind augenblicklich wieder so flüssig wie die eines Raubtiers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The music fades, and Solomorne lays his hand on his weapon with obvious relief, his movements immediately regaining their predatory fluidity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Musik verklingt und Solomorne legt mit offenkundiger Erleichterung die Hand auf seine Waffe. Seine Bewegungen sind augenblicklich wieder so flüssig wie die eines Raubtiers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La musique prend fin. Solomorne pose la main sur son arme avec un soulagement évident et ses mouvements regagnent immédiatement leur fluidité de prédateur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The music fades, and Solomorne lays his hand on his weapon with obvious relief, his movements immediately regaining their predatory fluidity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La musique prend fin. Solomorne pose la main sur son arme avec un soulagement évident et ses mouvements regagnent immédiatement leur fluidité de prédateur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}音楽が静まり、ソロモーンはあからさまに安堵した表情で武器に手を添えた。彼の動きはたちまち狩人のような滑らかさを取り戻す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The music fades, and Solomorne lays his hand on his weapon with obvious relief, his movements immediately regaining their predatory fluidity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}音楽が静まり、ソロモーンはあからさまに安堵した表情で武器に手を添えた。彼の動きはたちまち狩人のような滑らかさを取り戻す。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La música se detiene y Solomorne se lleva la mano al arma con evidente alivio, recuperando su habitual fluidez depredadora.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The music fades, and Solomorne lays his hand on his weapon with obvious relief, his movements immediately regaining their predatory fluidity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La música se detiene y Solomorne se lleva la mano al arma con evidente alivio, recuperando su habitual fluidez depredadora.{/n}

languages.text: {n}音乐停下来了，索罗蒙将手搭在武器上，明显松了口气。他的动作再次变得流畅起来，仿佛整装待发的掠食者一般。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The music fades, and Solomorne lays his hand on his weapon with obvious relief, his movements immediately regaining their predatory fluidity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}音乐停下来了，索罗蒙将手搭在武器上，明显松了口气。他的动作再次变得流畅起来，仿佛整装待发的掠食者一般。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Müzik duruyor ve Solomorne, bariz bir rahatlamayla elini silahına götürüyor. Hareketleri, o alıştığı yırtıcı hayvan çevikliğine tekrar kavuşuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The music fades, and Solomorne lays his hand on his weapon with obvious relief, his movements immediately regaining their predatory fluidity.{/n}
